Accused 
-
appellant 
IS  present  m  Court  produced  by 
the  Prison

Learned  Counsel  appearmg 
for 
the 
accused-appellant  makes  an

application 
to  withdraw  this  appeal.  He  further  makes  an  application 
to
implement the  sentence  from  the  date  of conviction.  Learned  S.S.C.  has no
objection  to  the  application  made  by counsel  for  back  dating  the  sentence,
but further states that the sentence was imposed on 20/08/2010.
Counsel for  the Accused- Appellant brings to the notice of Court
that the accused had been in remand for  a  long period of time.  Counsel for
the Respondent leaves the sentence in the hands of Court.
After  considering  the  submissions  made  on  behalf  of  the  Accused-
Appellant,  we  allow the  application of the  counsel for  the accused-appellant
to  withdraw  the  appeal.  We  also  direct  that  the  sentence  be  implemented

from 
the  date  of  the 
sentence  namely,  20th  August  2010.  Accordingly,
subject to the said direction the appeal is dismissed.
